data.partBlankContent: In the traditional publishing industry, the paperback has been king. Further cha____ to t__ publishing indu____ will b_ driven n__ only b_ increased availa______, b__ new con____. data.fullContent: In the traditional publishing industry, the paperback has been king. Further changes to the publishing industry will be driven not only by increased availability, but new content. For example, the traditional printed cookbook may be replaced by apps which feature a mixture of professional and user-generated content, interactivity, pictures, and videos. These apps already exist for both Apple and Google platforms.
data.answer: 在传统出版业，平装本一直是王者。出版业的进一步变化将不仅受到可获得性增加的推动，还将受到新内容的推动。例如，传统的印刷烹饪书可能会被以专业和用户生成的内容、交互性、图片和视频混合为特色的应用程序所取代。这些应用程序在苹果和谷歌平台上已经存在。
